sources.title: Apache (1954) Burt Lancaster Â· Jean Peters
sources.description: A Western about the last Apache warrior (1886), who becomes a peaceful farmer after a tragic battle against the whites. At the heart of this quiet, meticulously directed Western is an interesting character study. The happy ending was imposed on Aldrich by the producer.

metadata.Plot: Following the surrender of Geronimo, Massai, the last Apache warrior is captured and scheduled for transportation to a Florida reservation. Instead, he manages to escape and heads for his homeland to win back his girl and settle down to grow crops. His pursuers have other ideas though.
metadata.Actors: Burt Lancaster, Jean Peters, John McIntire
